Summary: About a dozen red lights flying over chicago followed by two airplanes that crossed paths
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around September 14th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsOn Sept 14, 2013 I was behind the museum of Science and Industry about 8:45 pm. Looking south I saw red lights at a distance between the trees rising as if it were fireworks. Looking up towards the moon I noticed they were traveling from the south to the north going directly above my head. They were at a very high altitude. Going in a straight line at a constant speed i counted about a dozen red lights. This line, not a perfect formation lasted about 2 minutes, Directly after this I noticed two airplanes, coming from the southeast. They were at a low enough altitude for me to see the whole shape of the plane. These two planes crossed paths. This is unusual because I would consider this a near crash. Would you please investigate this situation. I was in my proper fram of mind and this is NOT a hoax. At least check about the near miss with the two planes. One plane was on an intercept course towards the redlights. The lights dissappeared before downtown . there was no trail of light. The red lights were a perfect circle as they were approaching me, while overhead and as the past me. This in itself is unusual. I did not take pictures but I was not the only one who saw this. The sky was clear that night. The objects were very high and about half inch in diameter.
